definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]

sentences.english: The western margin of Ordos basin has experienced complicated tectonic evolution and the ordovician is the most important stages in its evolutive history.
sentences.chinese: 奧陶紀是鄂爾多斯西緣構造沉積演化的重要構成階段。

sentences.english: Ordovician organic reefs were first discovered in the Lunnan area, northern Tarim.
sentences.chinese: 首次發現輪南地區奧陶紀生物礁。

sentences.english: These conclusions show that the depositional environment of carbonate platform in the Ordovician was unstable.
sentences.chinese: 證明了奧陶紀碳酸鹽巖臺地沉積環境是不穩定的。
